phrases: I am sorry.
This is the best I could do right now.
Why did this have to happen?
Rune information particles.
You are saying that they are your food?
Humans are full of Runes!
Memories, the past?
And life!
Which means, once you have devoured their memories,
you move on to the information that is their life.
What does he mean, food?!
Why did Marie have to die because of you?
Not me.
It was the Valvrave that killed her.
It is the same thing!
The ones to blame are the humans who sealed me in here.
So they could use Runes.
What are you saying?
So, JIORan scientists turned you into an engine.
Through you, the Valvrave collects and uses Runes.
Yes, yes!
That is why it is not my fault!
I do eat a little, though...
What she is saying is probably true.
Professor?
Marie's postmortem showed an extremely low concentration
of kynurenic acid in her brain and red blood cells in her blood.
Far too low for someone who was healthy immediately beforehand.
That is probably evidence that her Runes had been eaten.
And you, Tokishima.
Your physical exams show the same
symptoms as Marie, although much less pronounced.
Are you saying I...
If you go on piloting the Valvrave, you will end up just like Marie.
An empty husk.
Huh?
Am I in the right...
Huh?
Who are you?
Me? I am...
Hey, who are you?
Uh, I am...
You there!
Mystery man!
Where did you guys...
Haruto.
Huh?
Haruto...
Oh, right, I am Haruto.
Do you know me?
Haruto... Haruto...
Who is Haruto?
You...
Get back!
Stay away from me!
Who am I?!
What are you?!
Tokishima!
Tokishima!
There is an alert, so please launch in your Valvrave.
Valvrave...
Unit 5 goes first!
Got that, Haruto?
Hm?
Hey!
Haruto!
Haruto, what are you doing?
Sorry!
Are you okay?
Can you stand?
Yes, I am fine.
Hey!
Stand aside!
I am going first!
There is no need.
Huh?
But we have incoming enemies!
We do not.
I am the one who sounded the false alarm.
Before the operation, I needed to ascertain whether or
not our weapons were functioning properly.
That jerk was testing me...
We are entering into a temporary partnership with the Dorssian Royalists.
Dorssian Royalists?
They want the royalty-based political system that existed before the coup.
Put simply, an anti-government organization.
They offered to provide us with supplies, did not they?
Why would they want to work with us?
It is simple.
The Royalists need our help as much as we need theirs.
A Dorssian submarine known as The Phantom.
Their condition for giving us supplies is that we destroy this.
Now I get it.
We scratch their back, they scratch ours.
The operation is set to commence in 32 hours.
I will tell everyone their work assignments one hour from now.
An operation, huh?
Hey, wait!
Should not looking for Miss Rukino come first?
She is still missing, remember?
Remember this.
The most important thing for a soldier is to come home alive.
You are hurt!
It is nothing to be concerned about.
Compared to your life, this is trivial.
He saved my life?
Back during the cave-in?
Good workout!
Is not this early for you?
I have been known to come in early sometimes.
I hear that they located A-drei.
I heard, I heard.
They said his injuries were not very severe, either.
That is good to hear.
That guy has the devil's own luck.
For former royalty, he is got a knack for survival.
Survival, huh?
You, on the other hand, do not.
Who was it who forced me to survive?
Huh?
That incident 12 years ago.
Do not you remember?
Oh, right!
That was the first time I would ever felt
death breathing down my neck.
Man, what a disaster that was.
We were sent out to eliminate a terrorist group,
but you would only equipped us with handguns.
What?
You are the one who rushed out ahead of us without
a proper weapon, H-neun!
My intent was to be meticulous in my preparations.
Oh?
Was it, now?
You are the who says crazy things about not going by the book.
You were a bookworm then, and you are a bookworm now.
You probably just took too long to get ready.
You instantly forget things when it is in your best interest to do so.
Fine, fine.
We came this close to dying.
I guess we had the devil's own luck, too.
You are wrong.
What saved us was Captain Cain.
The words he said to us that day still echo deep inside me.
He is such an amazing man.
Oh, right...
I am not going to make the afternoon meeting.
Write up a report for me.
You have something more important to do?
Yes, the Captain wants to see me.
I am being sent to a manor in the Grunau district.
Grunau!
What is it?
Forget it, it is nothing.
Watch your back.
What am I, a kid?
Grunau...
I have to fight.
Shoko, no, everyone, is counting on me.
I have to find Miss Rukino, too, but I...
Not good.
You are the same.
Like her.
The same how?
Runes decreasing.
Are you body-jacking?
Because you are eating them.
Will eventually lose memories.
Lose life.
That does not matter.
What is important is that you answer my question.
Are modified JIORans the only ones who can pilot the Valvraves?
Modified?
I mean Sakimori Academy students.
Oh.
Maybe.
All the others.
All of them were no good.
Made me feel sick.
You will not work, either.
You do not look very tasty.
People call it the Castle of No Return.
It is a manor that Cain visits regularly when he is off duty.
As I recall, it is located in the Grunau district...
Just as I thought.
I am glad I heard you out.
There is a constant stream of bizarre rumors about the place.
Even its name comes from the fact that
people who are brought there are never seen again.
It is that dangerous, huh?
I would love to look into it, but I have more pressing matters at the moment.
Look, could you give me the exact location?
We have plans in motion.
Do not do anything stupid.
Relax, it is not like that.
I am about to get my hands on some juicy intel,
so I want to memorize potentially important keywords.
Are you sure it is a good idea to bench two of us pilots?
Perhaps not, but you are the best choice to search for Saki Rukino.
Your hand-to-hand combat abilities are second only to my own.
And hacking will prove useful in the search.
You win.
Plus, you are the only one other than me who can recognize
Rukino in her jacked body.
Akira!
Listen, do not drink any unboiled water.
And do you have your cell phone?
I have it.
Are you sure you do not want me to stay behind?
You will be working with me independently.
On an operation.
Otamaya!
Prep all the Valvraves so that they can be
powered up at a moment's notice.
The Phantom, a ship that does not exist in Dorssian records,
and whose intended use is unknown.
The Royalists lack the equipment to track anything in the water.
And that is why they needed our help, huh?
If we can find out which waterway it is using, tracking it will be simple.
The people behind the scenes have let their guard down.
What is that the emblem of?
I have never seen it, either.
It is a crest that does not belong to the military or the royal family.
I am going to expose you for what you really are...
Stolen transport located.
All soldiers on guard duty, assemble at once.
I repeat, stolen transport has been located.
All soldiers on guard duty, assemble at once.
That is convenient.
That will thin out the castle's security.
I will be using you to my advantage, my good students...
We will need another impact booster up ahead, eh?
Another crest here...
X, I know that you worship the ground that Captain Cain walks on.
I know that you have no intention of listening to me.
But even so, I want to tell you this.
I saw something.
I saw him do something that no ordinary person could do.
That is when I was certain that the Captain is not human.
H-neun.
As I thought, you really do have a keen sense of smell.
But if this mission was so important,
you should not have tried to carry it out alone.
Um, I was invited to come here, but I arrived early.
Did you now?
That is unusual, for someone as constantly tardy as you.
Did you come alone?
It is crucial to have
someone you can trust watching your back at all times, H-neun.
Huh?
That is an out of character thing for you to say.
That day you saved us 12 years ago, you said something to us.
Are you all right?
Y-Yes, sir.
Never ask a friend to watch your back.
Have the strength to defend both your own back and your friends.
Yes, Captain!
Yet here you are, saying the exact opposite.
X-eins would cry if he heard that.
I see, so this man said something like that?
This man?
I have gone and damaged my collection.
We have identified the control room, engine room, and auxiliary power room.
However, this one hatch is not on the ship's schematics.
What is behind it?
We will know when we open it.
Chancellor?
What are you doing here?
What is your squad?
Have you met with Cain?
What is my squad?
This uniform says I am from Karlstein!
Karlstein?
What are you doing here?
I do not need to answer you.
What about the ritual?
Have not you started yet?
It talked?!
Is this part of the entertainment, Cain?
No, please pardon his poor manners.
Do show some restraint, will not you?
Tonight is a rather important ritual.
What the heck is this?
This light is the same as the Valvraves and Pino.
I do not believe it, they are harvesting Runes?
Does this mean that Runes were not
a theory that JIOR discovered independently?
Dorssia wants Runes, too...
So why?
Although acquiring the enormous quantity
of Runes needed for the ritual was no easy task,
that ship has served us well.
Another large shipment will arrive today.
Cain.
Surely this is not the man.
I believe I requested a young intellectual.
No, sir, I am aware of that.
The young flesh I have arranged for you will arrive here soon.
I do not believe it...!
Rejoice, H-neun!
X-eins' flesh will soon belong to my comrade.
Bastard!
I think it is time for a gun salute, do not you?
Are you satisfied?
With simply averting your eyes from reality?
What do you mean?
This does not change the fact that Dorssia is
harvesting Runes for some goal of its own.
Destroying this ship will only create a Phantom II and a Phantom III.
So you are saying it would only because more casualties.
You are free to run away.
But the world will continue turning, unchanged.
What do you expect me to do about it?
These tremors...
Cannon fire?
I thought this location was supposed to be safe!
Calm down!
Opening right rear hatch.
Unit 5, launching!
I will block the cannon fire for now!
Satomi, take up position behind me!
Cannot you swat them down?
All these at once?!
We have to head back.
I can use Unit 1 too
That will not be necessary.
Satomi Renbokoji!
Do you read me?
L-elf?
I read you!
Haruto Tokishima is injured.
I want you to pilot Unit 1.
Tokishima's hurt?
What is the matter?
Are you going to sit there trembling,
waiting for your dear little sister to return?
Hey!
L-elf!
L-elf!
Do not interfere.
What do you think you are doing?!
Every student at that academy
ought to have the aptitude to pilot a Valvrave.
That is not what I meant!
Getting into it will turn him into a
He will not die right away.
You are walking proof of that.
I have plenty of pawns.
If I set up a rotation among
the students to share Unit 1 piloting duties,
we will not have to worry about one pilot suffering from Rune deficiency.
It is the birth of an unkillable fighting force.
Are you kidding me?!
You knew all this would happen, did not you?
That is why you got me and Yamada away from the transport!
Do not get the wrong idea.
You are no longer a viable combatant.
What?
I do not have the luxury of entrusting Unit 1
to a coward who cannot bring himself to fight.
You do not...
You do not know what it is like!
You do not know how it feels to know that you
might lose your memories and then your life!
Then do you know what it is like for me?
To be unable to wield this power?
If I only had a Valvrave, I could...
My heat's almost maxed out!
Just like you said,
if I turn a blind eye and run away, the world will not change.
In which case, I
Crap, if this keeps up...
He is running?
Haruto!
Where are you going?!
No, it is the right move.
Go!
The bedrock in this area was severely softened
by the use of the Harakiri Blade in the last battle.
In addition, an existing volcano with high magma content,
the groundwater temperature, the impact on the terrain;
the conclusion these factors lead me to is...
I will not hand it over to anyone.
I will not share it, either.
This curse belongs to no one but me!
Prepare yourself, then.
I am going to use you until you burn out.
I do not care if I burn out.
Before my body falls apart,
I am...
Captain!
Are you all right?
The volcanic eruption is enough to
What in the world happened in here?
Is not... that H-neun's?
I do feel terrible about him, X-eins.
Sir?
What you do mean?
I suppose we have to start the ritual all over again.
I need to make arrangements for a new food source.
Next time, episode 18, A Father's Wish.
Valvrave the Liberator...
The system that will expose the truth of the world.
